nodes.text: Upper Markaran Outpost, originally Remote Markaran Outpost, was an outpost of the Sith Empire located in the Markaran Plains on Balmorra. Colonels Proshen and Teeg, Commander Moriden, Captain Jaggard, and Intelligence Officer Kytoma were stationed at the outpost. It was later taken over by the Balmorran resistance, with Sergeant Jolis, Feero, and I-M3 stationed there.
In the mission log for the mission "Biohazard," the outpost is mistakenly labeled as the "Troida Observation Outpost," despite the Troida Military Workshop being located in the Gorinth Canyon.
